# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to

# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to


Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

Question: क्या एक आदमी एक औरत के खिलाफ कानूनी कार्यवाही कर सकता है, जो एक तर्क के दौरान उसका अपमान करने के लिए अपने निशानों का विरोध कर सकता है, जैसा कि यह भारतीय पेनल कोड के 133 अधीन गिर जाता है?

Answer: जी हाँ, किसी को अपमान करने के लिए ज़बरदस्ती का इस्तेमाल करना एक अपराध है 133 के तहत। इस मामले में, महिला को उसे मार डालने के लिए, जो अपराध की कानूनी परिभाषा के साथ जुड़ा हुआ है। तो, उस आदमी के पास उसके खिलाफ कानूनी कार्यवाही करने का अधिकार है।

Document:
# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to


Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

Question: क्या एक पुरुष क़ानूनी कार्यवाही कर सकता है यदि एक स्त्री उसे अपमान करने के लिए मजबूर करे, जबकि उसे ऐसा करने के लिए मजबूर किया गया था?

# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to


Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

Answer: जी हाँ, एक व्यक्‍ति को किसी भी अपराध के कार्य में दूसरे व्यक्‍ति पर आपराधिक शक्‍ति का प्रयोग करने के लिए आदेश दिया जा सकता है ।

Question: क्या एक डाकू को खंड १३४ के साथ आदेश दिया जा सकता है यदि वे किसी दुकान पर कब्ज़ा करने के लिए शक्‍ति का प्रयोग करते थे लेकिन चोरी करने में सफल नहीं थे?

Answer: नहीं, चालक को इस स्थिति में खंड १३४ के साथ आदेश नहीं दिया जा सकता. जबकि डाकू बल का प्रयोग चोरी के अपराध के संबंध में किसी भी व्यक्‍ति के प्रति नहीं किया गया था. खंड १३४ लागू होता है जब कोई किसी दूसरे व्यक्‍ति को चोरी करने की कोशिश में किसी दूसरे पर बल प्रयोग करता है. इस मामले में, इंकार किया गया लेकिन चोरी के शिकार नहीं हुआ, तो पुलिस ने अपराध के सम्बन्ध में अपराध का प्रयोग किया ।

Document:
# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to


Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

Question: चोरी करने की कोशिश में बल का प्रयोग करने का कानूनी परिणाम क्या है, जैसा कि दस्तावेज़ में दिए वास्तविक संसार के दृश्‍य में दिखाया गया है?

Question: भारतीय पेनल कोड के खण्ड १३४ में, जिसने बल के साथ विरोध किया, क्या किसी पर हमला करने का आरोप लगाया जा सकता है?

Answer: हाँ, वे कर सकते हैं. खंड 134 के अनुसार, एक सार्वजनिक सेवक पर बल का उपयोग करके उनके कर्तव्य की हत्या में उन्हें रोकने के लिए एक अपराधी अपराध अपराध है. इस मामले में, Mercriging एक अपराधी अपराध के साथ विरोध किया जा सकता है, जिसका मतलब है बल के रूप में एक व्यक्ति को अपने कर्तव्य के अनुसार करने से रोकने की कोशिश की जा सकती है. इसलिए, जो व्यक्ति पर हमला किया जा सकता है जो व्यक्ति को 134 के अंतर्गत हमला किया जा सकता है.

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to", "domain": "legal", "dataset": "document_knowledge_qa_raft_p0.4"}

messages.content:
Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

Question: भारतीय पेनल कोड के खण्ड १३२ में एक जन सेवक कौन है?

Answer: एक व्यक्‍ति एक सार्वजनिक सेवक के तौर पर अपने कर्तव्य के कारण या उस व्यक्‍ति को ऐसे सार्वजनिक सेवक के रूप में अपने कर्तव्य के अनुसार चलने से रोकने या रोकने के इरादे से, या किसी भी कार्य करने के कारण, या ऐसे व्यक्‍ति द्वारा किए जाने की कोशिश करता है जो अपने कर्तव्य के अनुसार कार्य करता है ।

Question: भारतीय पेनल कोड के खण्ड १३२ में बताए गए एक सरकारी सेवक को अपने कर्तव्य से रोकने के लिए बल का प्रयोग करने का क़ानूनी परिणाम क्या है?

Answer: और जो शख्स किसी मोमिन को जानबूझ के मार डाले (ग़ुलाम की आज़ादी वगैरह उसका कुफ्फ़ारा नहीं बल्कि) उसकी सज़ा दोज़क है और वह उसे (किसी नेक काम) से रोके या फिर उसे (किसी नेक काम का) बदला लेने के लिए इस्तेमाल किया जाए तो जो शख्स उसे (अपने गुनाहों की) सज़ा में मुब्तिला करे या उसके बाद या उसके बाद या उसके बाद किसी अच्छे काम का इरादा करे तो उसकी सज़ा उसके लिए दो बरस कर दी जाएगी

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to", "domain": "legal", "dataset": "document_knowledge_qa_raft_p0.4"}

messages.content:
Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

Question: भारतीय पेनल कोड के अनुसार, किसी का अपमान करने के इरादे से किसी पर हमला करने का क़ानूनी परिणाम क्या है?

Answer: भारतीय पेनल कोड के खण्ड 133 के अनुसार, जो कोई किसी भी व्यक्‍ति पर हमला करता है या किसी भी व्यक्‍ति पर आपराधिक शक्‍ति प्रयोग करता है, उसका अपमान करता है, या उस व्यक्‍ति को अपमानित करता है, या फिर उस व्यक्‍ति को एक साल के लिए जेल में सज़ा दी जाएगी जो शायद एक, या दोनों के साथ, या दोनों के साथ, अच्छी, या दोनों के साथ ।

Question: क्या आप समझा सकते हैं कि एक सार्वजनिक दास पर अपराधी बल प्रयोग करने के क़ानूनी परिणाम अपने कर्तव्यों को पूरा कर रहे हैं, जैसा कि भारतीय पेनल कोड के १३२ में बताया गया है?

Answer: अगर एक व्यक्‍ति किसी सार्वजनिक सेवक पर हमला करता है या किसी सार्वजनिक सेवक पर आपराधिक शक्‍ति प्रयोग करता है, तो उसे दो साल के लिए जेल में डाल दिया जा सकता है, या दोनों ही हाथों से उन्हें रोका जा सकता है ।

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

Question: दी गयी दस्तावेज़ में प्रस्तुत भारतीय पेनल कोड का उद्देश्‍य क्या है?

Answer: भारतीय पेनल कोड आपराधिक बल से संबंधित कई कानूनी प्रबंधों की रूपरेखा देता है, असली दुनिया के दृष्टिकोणों के माध्यम से संबंधित जटिल विधियों को समझाते हैं. यह लोगों को उनके अधिकारों पर शिक्षित करने का लक्ष्य रखता है और अनुचित रूप से इस्तेमाल करने के क़ानूनी परिणाम.

# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to

# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to

# संरचना में Casblance: दस्तावेज़ में "पुंजीअल शासी निकाय" विभाग का क्या उद्देश्‍य है?

दस्तावेज़ के भाग में जानकारी प्रदान करते हैं कि किस प्रकार का निर्माण किया जाता है और काम कैसे किया जाता है. यह कई ट्रेब परियोजनाओं की भूमिका और जिम्मेदारियों की भूमिकाओं, प्रबंधकों, प्रबंधकों, और समाज के सदस्यों की समिति. इस संस्था के सदस्यों को निर्धारित करने के लिए अनुकूलता और निर्माण और निर्माण कार्यात्मक निर्देश प्रदान करने के लिए निर्माण और निर्माण के लिए निर्देश प्रदान करने के लिए निर्देश प्रदान करता है.

# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to

भारतीय पेनल कोड एक प्रमुख कानूनी संसाधन है जो वास्तविक संसार के दृष्टिकोण से सम्बन्धित विभिन्न विधियों को स्पष्ट करता है, व्यक्‍तियों को उनके अधिकारों पर शिक्षा देने का लक्ष्य रखता है और उन्हें अवैध रूप से इस्तेमाल करने के क़ानूनी परिणाम बताता है।

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to


Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

Document:
# **Indian Penal Code: Sections on Assault and Criminal Force**

# Title: **Section 131: Punishment for Assault or Criminal Force Otherwise Than on Grave Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 133: Assault or Criminal Force with Intent to Dishonour a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, intending thereby to


Document:
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

Question: क्या एक डाकू को खंड १३४ के साथ आदेश दिया जा सकता है यदि वे किसी दुकान पर कब्ज़ा करने के लिए शक्‍ति का प्रयोग करते थे लेकिन चोरी करने में सफल नहीं थे?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>
Answer: नहीं, चालक को इस स्थिति में खंड १३४ के साथ आदेश नहीं दिया जा सकता. जबकि डाकू बल का प्रयोग चोरी के अपराध के संबंध में किसी भी व्यक्‍ति के प्रति नहीं किया गया था. खंड १३४ लागू होता है जब कोई किसी दूसरे व्यक्‍ति को चोरी करने की कोशिश में किसी दूसरे पर बल प्रयोग करता है. इस मामले में, इंकार किया गया लेकिन चोरी के शिकार नहीं हुआ, तो पुलिस ने अपराध के सम्बन्ध में अपराध का प्रयोग किया ।

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person otherwise than on grave

and sudden provocation given by that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either

description for a term which may extend to three months, or with fine which may extend to

one thousand rupees, or with both.

## **Explanation 1:**

Grave and sudden provocation will not mitigate the punishment for an offence under this section:

- (a) If the provocation is sought or voluntarily provoked by the offender as an excuse for the offence.  

- (b) If the provocation is given by anything done in obedience to the law, or by a public servant, in the lawful exercise of the powers of such public servant.  

- (c) If the provocation is given by anything done in the lawful exercise of the right of private defence.  

## **Explanation 2:**

Whether the provocation was grave and sudden enough to mitigate the offence is a question of fact.

## **Section 132: Assault or Criminal Force to Deter Public Servant from Discharge of Duty**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person being a public servant in

the execution of his duty as such public servant, or with intent to prevent or deter that

person from discharging his duty as such public servant, or in consequence of anything

done or attempted to be done by such person in the lawful discharge of his duty, shall be

punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years,

or with fine, or with both.

messages.content:
<|start_of_role|>user<|end_of_role|>
dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

घर के मामलों की सेवकाई (एमएस) विकास के विस्तार में एक महत्त्वपूर्ण भूमिका अदा करती है _BAR_ ताकि शैक्षिक साधन प्रदान करें _BAR_ MHA ने आपराधिक नियमों और नियमों को निर्देशित करने के लिए अधिकार दिया है _BAR_ (HACACACACACA) इस संदर्भ में, HACHA (HACACACACHACACA), जो कि सभी पर्यावरण को सुरक्षित बनाए रखने के लिए, विशेष रूप से संबंधित वातावरण को सुरक्षित रखने के लिए, विशेष रूप से सुरक्षित रखने के लिए, विशेष रूप से सुरक्षित रखने के लिए.

{"sdg_document": "dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

# संरचना में Sblance: भारतीय पेनल कोड में घर की सेवा की क्या भूमिका है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>
भारत के प्रशासन और अभिकलन कोड के लिए जिम्मेदार है, जिसमें खंड 131,4 और 135 में दिए गए आपराधिक बल के प्रबंध शामिल हैं. सेवा पत्रों और स्थानीय नियमों के निरीक्षण और स्थानीय स्तर पर निरंतर लागू कर रहे हैं और वे लगातार लागू कर रहे हैं.

क्या भारतीय पेनल कोड का उद्देश्‍य है, जो कि दी गई दस्तावेज़ में वर्णित है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>
भारत में भारतीय पेनल कोड (PPC) एक व्यापक कानूनी कोड है जो आपराधिक कानून के साथ संबंधित विविध प्रबन्धों का विस्तार करता है, वास्तविक विश्व के दृश्‍य के माध्यम से संबंधित नियमों को समझाने का आदेश देता है. यह व्यक्‍तियों को अपने अधिकारों और अवैध बल के प्रयोग के क़ानूनी परिणामों के बारे में शिक्षा देने का लक्ष्य रखता है.

Question: आपराधिक शक्‍ति के संबंध में भारतीय पेनल कोड का उद्देश्‍य क्या है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>

dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

# संरचना में निर्देशित करने के लिए निर्माण परियोजना का क्या उद्देश्‍य है?

विकास परियोजना का निर्माण करने के लिए कार्य और निर्णय करने के लिए उचित कार्य और निर्णय प्रक्रिया बनाने के लिए जिम्मेदार है. इसमें अनिवार्य निर्देश, साधन, साधन बनाने और संघर्षों को स्थापित करने के लिए. प्रभावी निर्माण उद्देश्य भी शामिल है कि निर्माण निर्माण उद्देश्य, न्यायिक निर्माण कार्य, न्यायिक, और सहायक निर्माण परियोजना में प्रवेश करने के लिए.

metadata:
{"sdg_document": "dishonour that person, otherwise than on grave and sudden provocation given by that

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

इस दस्तावेज़ में निर्देश पत्र के भाग का क्या उद्देश्‍य है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>
विकास के निर्देश पत्र में जानकारी प्रदान करता है कि किस प्रकार का निर्माण परियोजना नियंत्रित है और कौन सी ज़िम्मेदारियाँ लागू की जाती हैं. यह निर्माण योजना में शामिल विभिन्न सूलीदारों की भूमिकाओं और ज़िम्मेदारियों को विशिष्ट करता है, जिसमें प्रबंधकों, प्रबंधकों, प्रबंधकों और समाज के सदस्यों की समिति भी शामिल है. इस विभाग के सदस्यों की मदद करना और संरचनाओं को समझने की ज़िम्मेदारी है कि वे किस तरह काम कर रहे हैं.

# संरचना के माध्यम से निर्माण परियोजना के लिए कौन जिम्मेदार है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>
विकास परियोजना प्रबंधन, विकास और संचालन के लिए जिम्मेदार है। इसमें अनिवार्य निर्देश, महत्वपूर्ण निर्देश, नियमों और नियमों का पालन करना, और विशिष्ट सम्बन्धों के साथ एक सकारात्मक सम्बन्ध स्थापित करना शामिल है।

# संरचना में Cabance: किस के लिए विशेष विस्तार और प्रबंधन के लिए जिम्मेदार है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>
विकास परियोजना का निर्माण निर्देशकों के एक बोर्ड द्वारा, विभिन्‍न सूली वाले समूहों के प्रतिनिधियों से, जिनमें शैक्षिक समुदाय, उद्योग के सहयोगियों, और समाज संगठन शामिल हैं. बोर्ड को बनाने के लिए जिम्मेदार है कि योजना स्थापित करें, वित्तीय प्रबंधन और वित्तीय नियमों के साथ लागू करें.

person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may

extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.

## **Section 134: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Commit Theft of Property Carried by a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting to commit

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

Question: एक व्यक्‍ति द्वारा किए गए संपत्ति को चोरी करने की कोशिश करने के लिए आपराधिक शक्‍ति का प्रयोग करने के लिए दंड क्या है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>

theft on any property which that person is then wearing or carrying, shall be punished with

imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine,

or with both.

## **Section 135: Assault or Criminal Force in Attempt to Wrongfully Confine a Person**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person, in attempting wrongfully

to confine that person, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a

term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to five thousand

rupees, or with both.

## **Section 136: Assault or Criminal Force on Grave and Sudden Provocation**

Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any person on grave and sudden

provocation given by that person, shall be punished with simple imprisonment for a

term which may extend to one month, or with fine which may extend to one thousand

rupees, or with both.

For more details, refer to the official document:

Ministry of Home Affairs – Indian Penal Code

# संरचना में Sblanter: घर के आदेशों की सेवा की क्या भूमिका है?
<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>
Wabab के विस्तार में घर के आदेशों के लिए जिम्मेदार है, भारतीय पेनल कोड का निरीक्षण करने के लिए, जिसमें 134, 135, और 1335 में दिए गए आपराधिक बल के इंतज़ाम शामिल हैं. एक निर्माण योजना के रूप में, घर की संरचना के माध्यम से, घर की व्यवस्था और कानून व्यवस्था के माध्यम से स्थापित।
